org.csstudio.swt.xygraph.figures
Class ToolbarArmedXYGraph

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.draw2d.Figure
      org.csstudio.swt.xygraph.figures.ToolbarArmedXYGraph
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.draw2d.IFigure
public class ToolbarArmedXYGraph
extends org.eclipse.draw2d.Figure

An graph which consists of a toolbar and an XYGraph.

Author:
Xihui Chen, Kay Kasemir added flags
